items.sentence: I don\'t think that what Tom said was accurate.
I don\'t think that you should see Tom anymore.
Tom didn\'t seem to notice that Mary was there.
I can\'t do anything to stop what\'s happening.
I\'ve been on the police force for three years.
I\'ve been thinking about this for a long time.
I\'ve decided not to go to Boston this weekend.
Tom needs to be told he\'s required to do that.
Mary claims that you stole the pearls from her.
Tom said he isn\'t planning on buying anything.
